coded_answer.p: It was so great to hear that I had won first prize. It would be meaningful in my life to take part in your camp. I am writing to reply aboutto your questions.

I am wondering that I will be onlyonly be able to travel in July, because I have to finish my first year at the university. It finishes 29th of June. In addition to this, I have already resistered on another course which starts from 2nd of August.

Secondly, I would prefer livingto liveto stay in tents, I always admirehave always admired outdoorsoutdoor life. Finally, I would like to do surgingsurfing and golf. In the case of surfing, I have never had anany experience, I am an absolutelyabsolute beginner. On the other hand, I used to play golf with my father. When I was 14, I won thea competition.
I would like to ask about Camp California. Let me know if I have to take which kind of clotheswhich kind of clothes I have to take and how much money I need. It would be very helpful.
I look forward to hearing from you.
Hi. How are you? I am fine. Thanks for your letter. I want to let you know about my experience as you wanted.

Well, last month, I worked at a pop concert. It was fantastic because I could see Madonna. My main job was to tidetidy up her dressing room. Can you imagine? You are working with your ideaideal woman, I can't stillstill can't belivebelieve that I spoke with her.

Anyway, the most important thing was that I had a good experience. If we had worked together we would have had a good time. It's a pity, isn't it? Now, I know how difficult it is to sing in front of thean audience and behind the startstage there are a lot of the people who help the performance.
Next time, I hope that we'll work together. Let's find some information to get a job. Shall we?
I have to go now. I am fed up with studying, but I have to. I hope that you'll be alright.
I am looking forward to hearing from you.
